## MapRenderingManager.setSize() method

The resize function to call on resize events to resize the render targets. It shall include the resize methods of all the sub-passes used in `MapRenderingManager`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setSize(width: number, height: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | number | New width to use. |
|  height | number | New height to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
